title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the organization's mission, values, and the specific activities and decisions to be monitored for potential drift.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data ingestion pipeline, data storage, AI model for detecting mission drift, and supporting components like monitoring, logging, and error handling.

title: Develop Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Implement the data ingestion pipeline to collect and preprocess the relevant data from various sources (e.g., documents, meeting notes, decision logs).

title: Set up Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution (e.g., database, data lake) to store the ingested data and the mission drift detection results.

title: Develop Mission Drift Detection Model
description: Implement the AI model for detecting potential mission drift based on the ingested data and the organization's mission and values.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for monitoring and visualizing the mission drift detection results.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system's security by implementing access controls, data encryption, and other necessary security measures.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Test and Validate
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to validate the system's functionality and performance.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the MissionDriftDetector application to the production environment and set up monitoring and logging systems.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance instructions.
